extension.summary: All the best from cCloud TV
extension.description: cCloud is an open source cloud based social IPTV service. It is built by the community for the community, where streaming is just a click away. Just click, play and stream. Yes, it's that simple. Just go to http://ccloudtv.org and enjoy:) Please report any channels that are down here http://www.tiny.cc/reportchs Users can now check servers status which can be found at http://ccloudtv.org/status

extension.summary: My First Plugin
extension.description: my first plugin description

extension.summary: Install MY Addons
extension.description: Download and install addons from podgod.......For OFFICIAL !! Support Visit TVADDONS.COM

addon.name: cCloud META (needed for cCloud TV Guide)
addon.summary: For use with the cCloud TV Guide
addon.description: This is simply a fork of the Meta addon for use with the cCloud TV Guide. Credit and thanks to the Meta Team, Midraal, OpenELEQ and all devs involved.

extension.disclaimer: cCloud TV Guide is a fork of FTV Guide by Bluezed and RayW1986, which is based on the original TV Guide addon by twinther. This is modified for use with the cCloud TV addon only. If you want an EPG with more features and compatible with other addons, please use FTV Guide, Redegades TV Guide or iVue TV Guide
